tunnelLayout.footerLegals: (1) Discount calculated on the lowest Alltricks price practiced during the 30 days preceding the start date of this product's promotional operation (2) Discount calculated on the lowest Alltricks price practiced during the 30 days preceding the start date of the sales. (3) Discount calculated on the lowest Alltricks price practiced during the 30 days preceding the start date of this product's clearance operation. (4) Free shipping from €100 with DPD. Valid only in metropolitan France and on all products sold and shipped by Alltricks. (5) From GMT+1 timezone. (6) Depending on order time, delivery location and subject to immediate payment. Valid only on all in-stock products sold and shipped by Alltricks. (7) Generally observed delivery times. (8) Generally observed preparation time for your order for all in-stock products sold and shipped by Alltricks. (9) Code to be entered before cart validation. (10) Financing offer without insurance with mandatory down payment, reserved for individuals and valid for any purchase from €80 to €6000. Subject to acceptance by Oney Bank. You have a 14-day cooling-off period to cancel your credit. Example in 3 installments for a €150 purchase, down payment of €52.51, then 2 monthly payments of €50. Credit over 2 months at fixed APR of 22.59%. Financing cost €2.51 within a maximum limit of €30. Example in 4 installments for a €400 purchase, down payment of €110, then 3 monthly payments of €100. Credit over 3 months at fixed APR of 22.63%. Financing cost: €10 within a maximum limit of €60. Conditions as of 13/11/2024 subject to revision. For more information visit [www.oney.fr](https://www.oney.fr/). Oney Bank- SA with capital of €71,801,205 - 34 Avenue de Flandre 59 170 Croix – RCS Lille Métropole – 546 380 197 – Orias no. 07 023 261 www.orias.fr – Correspondence: CS 60 006 – 59 895 Lille Cedex 9 – www.oney.fr. (11) Subject to immediate payment. (12) 10% of orders may be subject to random control by Oney requiring an additional 24 hours. (13) Free and unlimited delivery valid for 1 year for metropolitan France excluding Corsica after subscribing to the Alltricks+ offer via Chronopost relay, Mondial Relay, Colissimo and France Express with no minimum purchase. Free from €25 purchase on Chronopost home delivery. Valid only on all products sold and shipped by Alltricks. (14) -10% additional discount valid with no minimum purchase on all products sold and shipped by Alltricks. Discount sent by email on your birthday after subscribing to the Alltricks+ offer, valid once. (15) Recommended retail price by the supplier (or public price communicated by the partner seller in the case of partner seller products) (16) In January 2015, via a Trustpilot user vote, among e-commerce sites present on the Trustpilot platform. (17) Credit commits you and must be repaid. Check your repayment capacity before committing. (18) Excluding partner seller products.

emptyCartCard.title: Your cart is empty
emptyCartCard.description: Getting properly equipped has never been so simple

header.title: Protect your bike!
header.description: Choose insurance and ride with peace of mind!

goods.title: Covered Goods
goods.content: All bikes sold by Alltricks (electric, mountain, road, city, children's, etc.) are insurable against theft and breakage.

breakage.title: Covered Breakage
breakage.content: In case of accidental breakage, the insurance covers the repair or replacement of the bike, or pays financial compensation if repair is impossible. The insurance covers these products for non-professional use and excludes competitions, sporting events, trials and races.

theft.title: Covered Theft
theft.content: The insurance covers theft at home, on public roads (except 11pm-7am) or during travel in metropolitan France, including Corsica and Monaco. The insurance pays financial compensation directly to your bank account.

details.residence: The insured must have their main residence in France.
details.billing: The billing address corresponds to the address of the insured's main residence.
details.claim: Two claims per year are covered, with a maximum of €9,000 including tax per claim.
details.depreciation: In case of a claim in the second year, depreciation of 1% per month applies from the 13th month.

staff.label: Staff discount
staff.cgv: I have read the conditions regarding discounts granted to staff.

validity.successMessage: Your staff discount has been successfully applied to eligible products (sold by Alltricks).
validity.errorMessage: There was an error. Please try again.

staff.conditionsDescription:
All employees of AVANIS company (permanent contracts, fixed-term contracts, interns and apprentices) can benefit from this discount (from their arrival and throughout the duration of their contract).



The purchase of one or more products, with application of the discount, is reserved exclusively for employees and their household (spouse and children) and without profit / resale purpose.



Regarding payment, the order must be paid with a payment method in the employee's name.



For information, the discount is calculated according to the following rule: up to 30% discount compared to the Alltricks selling price and within the limit of the cost price for Alltricks and a maximum reduction of 40% on the recommended retail price.



The discount applies all year round and on all products sold by Alltricks.



The staff discount cannot be combined with other promotional codes, Alltricks+ cashback or gift cards obtained through Troc Vélo sales.



The order limit is set at €5,000 per calendar year excluding adult bikes per employee.



Regarding adult bikes, you have the possibility to buy up to two adult bikes per calendar year* and without amount limit.



*limited to one adult bike for a contract / presence of 6 months or less in the company.

assemblyModal.partialOrTotalAssemblyQuestion: Partial or 100% assembly, what is it?

details.one: (1) Bike fully assembled, checked and adjusted by our expert mechanics. To reduce the environmental impact of transport, we have removed the front wheel and pedals from your bike. The box used is thus lighter and less bulky. You will only need to reassemble them and enjoy your new bike. We recommend adjusting the saddle height as well as tire and suspension pressure according to your preferences.
details.two: (2) Within 2 years of purchasing the bike.
details.three: (3) Within 3 months of purchasing the bike. Services are valid only in one of our Alltricks stores. Find information on Bronze and Gold service details here: <link>www.alltricks.fr/surl/l-atelier</link>

basicServicesTable.details: (1) Bike fully assembled, checked and adjusted by our expert mechanics. To reduce the environmental impact of transport, we have removed the front wheel and pedals from your bike. The box used is thus lighter and less bulky. You will only need to reassemble it and enjoy your new bike. We recommend adjusting the saddle height as well as tire and suspension pressure according to your preferences.

items.note: A number of assembly steps will be required to ride
Assembled, checked and adjusted by our expert mechanics

items.service: First service free at Alltricks store
items.access: Fast-track access to our experts for 3 months

items.service: 3 services + 2h of free labor for 2 years
items.access: Fast-track access to our experts for 1 year

storeChateaudun.storeChateaudunNotification: Your order will be available in the warehouse within 24 to 48 business hours. You will receive an SMS and email as soon as it's ready for pickup. The package will remain available for 10 days.
